breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
breakfast.instructions: 1. Place yogurt in a bowl. 2. Top with berries and honey.

lunch.name: Chicken Salad with Carrots
lunch.instructions: 1. Shred chicken. 2. Mix with carrots and mayo. 3. Add lemon juice.

dinner.name: Lentil Soup
dinner.instructions: 1. Sauté onion. 2. Add lentils, tomatoes, and broth. 3. Simmer until lentils are soft.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach
breakfast.instructions: 1. Sauté spinach. 2. Whisk eggs and add to pan. 3. Crumble feta on top.

lunch.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
lunch.instructions: 1. Cook quinoa. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Mix all ingredients with vinaigrette.

dinner.name: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
dinner.instructions: 1. Season salmon and asparagus. 2. Bake at 400F for 15 minutes.

lunch.name: Turkey and Avocado Lettuce Wraps
lunch.instructions: 1. Slice turkey and avocado. 2. Wrap in lettuce with tomato.

dinner.name: Chicken Stir-Fry with Rice
dinner.instructions: 1. Stir-fry chicken and vegetables. 2. Add soy sauce. 3. Serve with rice.

breakfast.name: Chia Seed Pudding
breakfast.instructions: 1. Mix chia seeds and almond milk. 2. Refrigerate overnight. 3. Top with berries and honey.

dinner.name: Ground Beef with Zucchini Noodles
dinner.instructions: 1. Brown ground beef. 2. Add tomato sauce and garlic. 3. Serve over zucchini noodles.

breakfast.name: Omelet with Vegetables
breakfast.instructions: 1. Sauté vegetables. 2. Pour eggs over vegetables. 3. Sprinkle with cheese.

lunch.name: Tuna Salad with Cucumber
lunch.instructions: 1. Mix tuna with cucumber and mayonnaise. 2. Add lemon juice.

dinner.name: Chicken and Vegetable Skewers
dinner.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken and vegetables. 2. Thread onto skewers. 3. Grill until cooked.

breakfast.name: Avocado Toast with Egg
breakfast.instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado and spread on toast. 3. Top with fried egg.

dinner.name: Shepherd's Pie (Cauliflower Mash)
dinner.instructions: 1. Cook lamb with vegetables. 2. Top with cauliflower mash. 3. Bake until golden.

breakfast.name: Pancakes (Gluten-Free)
breakfast.instructions: 1. Mix all ingredients. 2. Cook on a griddle.

lunch.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
lunch.instructions: 1. Grill chicken. 2. Mix with lettuce, parmesan, and dressing.

dinner.name: Roasted Chicken with Vegetables
dinner.instructions: 1. Roast chicken with vegetables and rosemary.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Berries
breakfast.instructions: 1. Cook oats with milk. 2. Top with berries and honey.

lunch.name: Lentil Soup
lunch.instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients. 2. Simmer until lentils are tender.

dinner.name: Vegetarian Chili
dinner.instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients. 2. Simmer for 20 minutes.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Eggs
breakfast.instructions: 1. Whisk eggs and milk. 2. Cook in pan. 3. Add cheese and spinach.

lunch.name: Rice and Bean Bowl
lunch.instructions: 1. Cook rice. 2. Combine with beans, salsa, and avocado.

dinner.name: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
dinner.instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Heat tomato sauce with garlic and basil. 3. Top with parmesan.

breakfast.name: Yogurt Parfait
breakfast.instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and fruit. 2. Drizzle with honey.

lunch.name: Quesadillas
lunch.instructions: 1. Fill tortillas with cheese, beans, and salsa. 2. Grill until cheese is melted.

dinner.name: Vegetable Curry
dinner.instructions: 1. Simmer chickpeas, spinach, and curry powder in coconut milk. 2. Serve with rice.

breakfast.name: Toast with Avocado
breakfast.instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado on toast. 3. Top with fried egg and seasoning.

dinner.name: Mushroom Risotto
dinner.instructions: 1. Cook onion and mushrooms. 2. Add rice and broth gradually. 3. Stir in parmesan.

lunch.name: Vegetable Wraps
lunch.instructions: 1. Spread hummus on tortillas. 2. Add carrots, cucumber, and spinach. 3. Wrap.

dinner.name: Pizza
dinner.instructions: 1. Spread sauce on dough. 2. Add cheese and vegetables. 3. Bake until crust is golden.

breakfast.name: Pancakes
breakfast.instructions: 1. Mix pancake mix, milk and egg. 2. Cook pancakes. 3. Top with berries.

lunch.name: Grilled Cheese
lunch.instructions: 1. Butter bread. 2. Place cheese between slices. 3. Grill until golden.

dinner.name: Pasta Primavera
dinner.instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Add vegetables and lemon. 3. Top with parmesan.

breakfast.name: Waffles
breakfast.instructions: 1. Mix waffle mix, milk, and egg. 2. Cook waffles. 3. Top with fruit.

lunch.name: Salad
lunch.instructions: 1. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.

dinner.name: Vegetable Skewers
dinner.instructions: 1. Marinate tofu and vegetables. 2. Skewer and grill.
